member.summary: This is a trivial class that is used to make sure that Equals and GetHashCode are properly overloaded with the correct semantics. This is exteremely important if you are going to deal with objects outside the current Unit of Work.

member.summary: Determines whether the specified is equal to the current .
member.param: The to compare with the current .
member.returns: true if the specified is equal to the current ; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:KnowYourTurf.Security.Model.EqualityAndHashCodeProvider`1.GetHashCode
member.summary: Serves as a hash function for a particular type. is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
member.returns: A hash code for the current .

member.name: M:KnowYourTurf.Security.Model.EqualityAndHashCodeProvider`1.op_Equality(KnowYourTurf.Security.Model.EqualityAndHashCodeProvider{`0},KnowYourTurf.Security.Model.EqualityAndHashCodeProvider{`0})
member.summary: Equality operator so we can have == semantics

member.name: M:KnowYourTurf.Security.Model.EqualityAndHashCodeProvider`1.op_Inequality(KnowYourTurf.Security.Model.EqualityAndHashCodeProvider{`0},KnowYourTurf.Security.Model.EqualityAndHashCodeProvider{`0})
member.summary: Inequality operator so we can have != semantics

member.name: P:KnowYourTurf.Security.Properties.Resources.EntityWithGroups
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' ('{1}' is a member of '{2}').

member.name: P:KnowYourTurf.Security.Properties.Resources.Everything
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to everything.

member.name: P:KnowYourTurf.Security.Properties.Resources.NonUniqueName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Names must be unique.

member.name: P:KnowYourTurf.Security.Properties.Resources.NotAssociatedWithAnyGroup
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to not assoicated with any group.

member.name: P:KnowYourTurf.Security.Properties.Resources.OperationNotDefined
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Operation '{0}' was not defined.

member.name: P:KnowYourTurf.Security.Properties.Resources.PermissionDeniedForUser
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Permission (level {3}) for operation '{0}' was denied to '{1}' on '{2}'.

member.name: P:KnowYourTurf.Security.Properties.Resources.PermissionDeniedForUsersGroup
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Permission (level {4}) for operation '{0}' was denied to group '{1}' on '{2}' ('{3}' is a member of '{5}').

member.name: P:KnowYourTurf.Security.Properties.Resources.PermissionForOperationNotGrantedToUser
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Permission for operation '{0}' was not granted to user '{1}' or to the groups '{1}' is associated with ('{2}').

member.name: P:KnowYourTurf.Security.Properties.Resources.PermissionForOperationNotGrantedToUserOnEntity
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Permission for operation '{0}' was not granted to user '{1}' or to the groups '{1}' is associated with ('{2}') on '{3}' or any of the groups '{3}' is associated with ('{4}').

member.name: P:KnowYourTurf.Security.Properties.Resources.PermissionGrantedForUser
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Permission (level {3}) for operation '{0}' was granted to '{1}' on '{2}'.

member.name: P:KnowYourTurf.Security.Properties.Resources.PermissionGrantedForUsersGroup
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Permission (level {4}) for operation '{0}' was granted to group '{1}' on '{2}' ('{3}' is a member of '{5}').

member.name: M:KnowYourTurf.Security.Impl.Guard.Against(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Will throw a if the assertion is true, with the specificied message.
member.example:
Sample usage:
Guard.Against(string.IsNullOrEmpty(name), "Name must have a value");

member.name: M:KnowYourTurf.Security.Impl.Guard.Against``1(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Will throw exception of type with the specified message if the assertion is true
member.example:
Sample usage:
Guard.Against<ArgumentException>(string.IsNullOrEmpty(name), "Name must have a value");
